hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Kokiri Emerald# and #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Stick Capacity#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #10# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #7# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #the Requiem of Spirit#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Did you know that you can tune a piano but you can't tune a fish?

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Did you know that ReDead and Gibdo have their own version of Sun's Song that freezes you?

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Water Temple Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Stick Capacity#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #the Biggoron Sword#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say Goron fabrics protect against more than fire.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.
